mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.role_name AS roleName, t1.role_code AS roleCode, t1.is_admin AS isAdmin, t1.remark, t1.isvalid, t1.ctime, t1.creater, t1.mtime, t1.updater, CASE WHEN t2.user_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isAssigned FROM sys_role t1 LEFT JOIN sys_user_role t2 ON t2.isvalid = 1 AND t2.role_id = t1.id AND t2.user_id = #{userId} WHERE t1.isvalid = 1
